page.title: 17Faversham Walk-Directions
page.content:
Starting at Ospringe C.E.P.S.
Follow the track, by the school, through the allotments. Left over the stile to the hop sheds at the top. Along the bank on the right, good view of Ospringe and Faversham. Over the two stiles into Syndale Park with its fine trees. Head across, northwards over the track, towards the motel. With the motel on the left follow the bank and sheep tracks down to the gate. Continue to the road and cross over and through Syndale Farm, heading up Beacon Hill- a good view of the D-Block from here! South, along track, over gate to wood. Follow path to the corner of the orchard-keep right! Then down to meadow. Cross road to meadow, up through wood, along field to bridge through farm, left along road. Over motorway, turn right back to School.
